column1: The House of the Fountain was one of the Twelve Houses of the Gondolindrim
column2: whose Lord was Ecthelion. They were said to find delight in silver and diamonds
column3: and their swords were long and bright and pale.  The People of the Fountain of the South
column5: went into battle accompanied by the sweet music of their flutes.

column3: they were held in reserve by Turgon
column4: who unleashed them after the Balrogs made a breach in the wall. They made their entrance from the South part of the city and slew a great number of foes. As Balrogs and Dragons led an army who outnumbered them
column5: the People of the Fountain began retreat towards the Square of the King. Most likely
column6: the House of the Fountain soon dissolved after the death of Ecthelion at the Fountain of the King
column7: since there is no mention of it afterwards.
